channel.title: I need help with a few things please
channel.description:
Hello moparscape, i just need some help with the following things.
1. How do i change a wild area to safe zone?
I wan't to know how to do this because i had made a staff zone at the graveyard event area and we keep attacking eachother...
2. How do i change the area of when a person dies what coordinates they end up in?
I went in player.java and changed the starting area but i can't change where you end up when you die, help please :D
I need a few more things answered but they can wait, i'm more concerned about these things thanks.

item.title: I need help with a few things please
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

Ok do i just enter the coordinates of when you tele there, or the coordinates of the whole place in the nonwild method?

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with a few things please

item.title: I need help with a few things please
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“r34p4g3pk, post:1, topic:253555”]Hello moparscape, i just need some help with the following things.

  1. How do i change a wild area to safe zone?

I wan’t to know how to do this because i had made a staff zone at the graveyard event area and we keep attacking eachother…

  1. How do i change the area of when a person dies what coordinates they end up in?

I went in player.java and changed the starting area but i can’t change where you end up when you die, help please

I need a few more things answered but they can wait, i’m more concerned about these things thanks.[/quote]

  1. Edit your nonWild method.
  2. Find out what the coordinates are, find them and change them…
    Common sense.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with a few things please
